body: If you want to avoid this `pragma`, then we will have to add `shlwapi.lib` to linker flags. For Bazel it will be `-defaultlib:shlwapi.lib` or Bazel will think `shlwapi.lib` is a label.
body_html: If you want to avoid this pragma, then we will have to add shlwapi.lib to linker flags. For Bazel it will be -defaultlib:shlwapi.lib or Bazel will think shlwapi.lib is a label.
body_text: If you want to avoid this pragma, then we will have to add shlwapi.lib to linker flags. For Bazel it will be -defaultlib:shlwapi.lib or Bazel will think shlwapi.lib is a label.
